description: LaHaus AI KAM/AE (Key Account Managers / Account Executives) schema for HubSpot CRM

owners.name: Juan Pablo
owners.notes: userId differs from ownerId in HubSpot CRM

owners.name: Geraldine
owners.notes: userId differs from ownerId in HubSpot CRM

id_mapping_notes.user_id: ID from HubSpot Settings > Users & Teams (used for user management)
id_mapping_notes.owner_id: ID from HubSpot CRM owner assignment (used in hubspot_owner_id property on deals/contacts)
id_mapping_notes.important: Always use owner_id when querying deals by owner via CRM API
